isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - TV/VCR Wiring W/60 Inch Cantilever Sleeper

svcproc.title: TV/VCR Wiring W/60 Inch Cantilever Sleeper
svcproc.para: When the Master ON/OFF Switch of the sleeper is in the position (closed), power flows from B1 battery stud through circuits 14K, 14R, fusible link (2 - Blue 12GA), and circuit 14S to energize the sleeper magnetic switch. The ground path from the magnetic switch is circuit 11V, master ON/OFF switch, and circuit 11W to sleeper box ground stud.

With the sleeper magnetic switch energized, and the Storage Area Light switched ON, power is available to flow from the magnetic switch through circuit 14A, fuse M2 and 63AF to the TV Power Source socket, and fuse M3 and circuit 80H to the VCR Power Source socket. The ground path is circuit 11C for the TV, and 11A for the VCR Power Source to Sleeper Ground Stud.
